pageContext.collection_description: Contains papers relating to Rabbi Feinberg's radio career, 1932-1972, including Message of Israel, 1937- 1969, Brotherhood Hour (broadcast in Canada), 1947, Grey Lib, 1972, and his career as the singer Anthony Frome on the Poet Prince on NBC, 1932-1935.
pageContext.collection_notes: A second Feinberg collection includes material on radio messages he delivered in 1942.
